title: So my laptop freezes when I try to re install
body: I've been playing LoL for years now and I didn't have this kind of problem before. So in the loading screens my whole league crashed so when I try to log back in the client says some files are corrupted, :0 so I uninstalled and tried to re install it but now after 33% my laptop freezes for more than 10 mins and then says there was an error. I tried like 3 times but the same problem keeps happening. Help plz

replies.body:
Hey there,

What is the exact error message you are receiving?
